B","details":"Still in pre-alpha stage, report issues to chainpact@nmodulo.comTo be used with OpenZeppelin upgrades plugin","events":{"LogPaymentMade(bytes32,uint256,address)":{"params":{"pactid":"The UID for the pact","payer":"The wallet making the payment, usually Employer ","value":"Value of the payment made"}},"LogStateUpdate(bytes32,uint8,address)":{"params":{"newState":"The resulting new state","pactid":"The UID of the pact","updater":"The account that triggered this change"}}},"kind":"dev","methods":{"acceptOrRejectArbitrators(bytes32,bool)":{"params":{"acceptOrReject":"Whether to accept (true) or reject (false) the list of accounts as arbitrators, proposed by the other party","pactid":"Pact UID"}},"addExternalPayClaim(bytes32,uint256,bool)":{"details":"Doesn't do much, except for adding a record","params":{"confirm":"Whether to confirm (true) or reject (false)","pactid":"Pact UID","payTime":"The timestamp of claimed payment"}},"approvePayment(bytes32)":{"details":"The payAmount can be both in ERC20 terms or native value tokensThe payment is sent directly with this, not a pull payment","params":{"pactid":"Pact UID"}},"arbitratorResolve(bytes32)":{"params":{"pactid":"Pact UID"}},"constructor":{"custom:oz-upgrades-unsafe-allow":"constructor","details":"Disables initialization on the logic contract after deployment, since the proxy contract will not call this constructor"},"createPact(bytes32,address,address,uint32,uint128,address,bytes32)":{"details":"Creates a UID based on the sender's address, pactCounter and block information, deemed unique, however,     predictable. Should be created by an externally owned address, as some functionality may break if an external contract tries to create and manage pacts. ","params":{"employee_":"The receiver of payment","employer_":"The payer","erc20TokenAddress_":"The token address, if any, or address(0) to use native value","externalDocumentHash_":"The hash of text of any External Document to be attached to the pact","pactName_":"Name for this pact","payAmount_":"The amount to be paid - decimals to be inferrred from erc20TokenAddress","payScheduleDays_":"The number of days in which the payAmount should be paid"}},"delegatePact(bytes32,address[],bool)":{"params":{"addOrRevoke":"Either revoke or grant, based on whether this flag is true or false","delegates":"List of addresses to give powers of delegation to, for this pact related actions (not to be confused with delegate in other ERC's)","pactid":"UID of the pact"}},"dispute(bytes32,uint256)":{"details":"the pactData and payData are passed as storage","params":{"pactid":"Pact UID","suggestedAmountClaim":"The amount claimed by the  "}},"fNf(bytes32,uint256)":{"params":{"pactid":"Pact UID","tokenAmount":"Amount of tokens, if the payment mode is ERC-20 token/stablecoin"}},"getArbitratrators(bytes32)":{"params":{"pactid":"The UID of the pact"}},"initialize(uint256,address)":{"details":"Initialize function be used from the delegator/proxy contract only"},"isParty(bytes32,address)":{"params":{"pactid":"The Pact UID","party":"The address to check"}},"owner()":{"details":"Returns the address of the current owner."},"pauseUnpausePanic(bool)":{"details":"To be used to pause/unpause in panic"},"proposeArbitrators(bytes32,address[])":{"params":{"pactid":"Pact UID","proposedArbitrators_":"The list of accounts to act as arbitrators who can mark the pact resolved"}},"proxiableUUID()":{"details":"Implementation of the ERC1822 {proxiableUUID} function. This returns the storage slot used by the implementation. It is used to validate the implementation's compatibility when performing an upgrade. IMPORTANT: A proxy pointing at a proxiable contract should not be considered proxiable itself, because this risks bricking a proxy that upgrades to it, by delegating to itself until out of gas. Thus it is critical that this function revert if invoked through a proxy. This is guaranteed by the `notDelegated` modifier."},"reclaimStake(bytes32,address)":{"params":{"pactid":"Pact UID","payee":"The account to transfer the money to"}},"renounceOwnership()":{"details":"Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner."},"signPact(bytes32,bytes,uint256)":{"params":{"pactid":"The UID for the pact","signature":"The signature coming from the user's wallet, that is a sign on the hash of the pact data","signingDate_":"The date the msg.sender deems the signature was created using"}},"startPausePact(bytes32,bool)":{"details":"can be used for \"start pact\" or \"pause pact\" or \"resume pact\"","params":{"pactid":"Pact UID","toStart":"true for starting, false for pausing"}},"terminate(bytes32)":{"params":{"pactid":"Pact UID"}},"transferOwnership(address)":{"details":"Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner."},"upgradeTo(address)":{"details":"Upgrade the implementation of the proxy to `newImplementation`. Calls {_authorizeUpgrade}. Emits an {Upgraded} event."},"upgradeToAndCall(address,bytes)":{"details":"Upgrade the implementation of the proxy to `newImplementation`, and subsequently execute the function call encoded in `data`. Calls {_authorizeUpgrade}. Emits an {Upgraded} event."}},"stateVariables":{"_paused":{"details":"for a pausing mechanism"},"commissionPercentage":{"details":"Commission rate per cent"},"commissionSink":{"details":"Address (EOA) of where the commissions are sent to"},"pactsCounter":{"details":"keeps the count of the pacts, not to be called from outside"}},"title":"ChainPact main logic contract","version":1},"userdoc":{"events":{"LogPaymentMade(bytes32,uint256,address)":{"notice":"Event triggered upon payment from employer to employee"},"LogStateUpdate(bytes32,uint8,address)":{"notice":"Event emitted whenever a change to pactState is made by any party or delegated account"}},"kind":"user","methods":{"acceptOrRejectArbitrators(bytes32,bool)":{"notice":"Function to accept or reject set of arbitrators proposed by the other party"},"addExternalPayClaim(bytes32,uint256,bool)":{"notice":"Function to add a record of an external payment"},"approvePayment(bytes32)":{"notice":"Function to send payment from employer to employee"},"arbitratorResolve(bytes32)":{"notice":"To be used by all arbitrators to mark the pact as resolved"},"createPact(bytes32,address,address,uint32,uint128,address,bytes32)":{"notice":"Function to create a new Gig pact. "},"delegatePact(bytes32,address[],bool)":{"notice":"Function to add other EOAs"},"dispute(bytes32,uint256)":{"notice":"Function to raise a dispute by the employee or a delegate. Puts the state of the  pact into DISPUTED, and assigns a proposed \"dispute amount\". The hope is that  the employer will send in this dispute amount and resolve it readily."},"externalDocumentHash(bytes32)":{"notice":"Hash of any external document to be added along with pactData"},"fNf(bytes32,uint256)":{"notice":"Function to send full and final settlement by either parties"},"getArbitratrators(bytes32)":{"notice":"Get the list of arbitrators currently proposed (if any)"},"isEmployeeDelegate(bytes32,address)":{"notice":"Mapping to identify for a given pactId, whether an account is an employee delegatee"},"isEmployerDelegate(bytes32,address)":{"notice":"Mapping to identify for a given pactId, whether an account is an employer delegatee"},"isParty(bytes32,address)":{"notice":"Function to tell if an account is party to the pact in any way"},"pactData(bytes32)":{"notice":"The core pact data mapped to pactId"},"payData(bytes32)":{"notice":"The pact pay related data mapped to pactId"},"proposeArbitrators(bytes32,address[])":{"notice":"Function to let third party list of accounts act as dispute arbitrators.         Can only be called when the pactState is DISPUTED"},"reclaimStake(bytes32,address)":{"notice":"Function to reclaim stake to be used by the employer"},"signPact(bytes32,bytes,uint256)":{"notice":"Function to record the signature of the parties for future use"},"startPausePact(bytes32,bool)":{"notice":"Function to start or pause a pact, making it active or Paused"},"terminate(bytes32)":{"notice":"Function to initiate termination by either parties and their delegates          Marks the pact as RESIGNED if initiated by employee or delegates,          as TERMINATED if initiated by employer or delegates"}},"notice":"The main logic contract of Gig documentation.text: @dev Initialize function be used from the delegator/proxy contract only

@notice The pact pay related data mapped to pactId

@notice Mapping to identify for a given pactId, whether an account is an employer delegatee

@dev Commission rate per cent

statements.documentation: @dev the pause duration gets added up since last pauseResumeTime, considering there could be multiple pauses before a payment is made
@dev Storing the timestamp as now to consider pro-rata payment from this point on
@dev don't allow if the pactState is something else

@dev reset the pause duration for future considerations
